children.structure_process: 1. Concrete Experience → 2. Reflective Observation → 3. Abstract Conceptualization → 4. Active Experimentation

children.examples: Design Thinking classroom project, Lab-based physics lesson, Fieldwork in anthropology

children.terminology: 1. Concrete Experience → Direct engagement or doing
2. Reflective Observation → Reviewing and thinking back on experience
3. Abstract Conceptualization → Forming theories or generalizations
4. Active Experimentation → Applying ideas to new situations
